Interface BlueprintsPersistence

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryBlueprintPersistence
public interface BlueprintsPersistence
Interface for blueprint persistence.
Author:
hcadavid, dsbaenar

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deleteBlueprint(Blueprint bp)
    Deletes an existing blueprint.
    Set<Blueprint>
    getAllBlueprints()
    Gets all the blueprints in the system.
    Blueprint
    getBlueprint(String author, String bprintname)
    Gets a blueprint by its author and name.
    void
    saveBlueprint(Blueprint bp)
    Saves a new blueprint.
    void
    updateBlueprint(Blueprint bp)
    Updates an existing blueprint.

  • Method Details

    • saveBlueprint

      void saveBlueprint(Blueprint bp) throws BlueprintPersistenceException
      Saves a new blueprint.
      Parameters:
      bp - the new blueprint
      Throws:
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if a blueprint with the same name already exists, or any other low-level persistence error occurs.

    • getBlueprint

      Blueprint getBlueprint(String author, String bprintname) throws BlueprintNotFoundException
      Gets a blueprint by its author and name.
      Parameters:
      author - blueprint's author
      bprintname - blueprint's author
      Returns:
      the blueprint of the given name and author
      Throws:
      BlueprintNotFoundException - if there is no such blueprint

    • getAllBlueprints

      Set<Blueprint> getAllBlueprints() throws BlueprintPersistenceException
      Gets all the blueprints in the system.
      Returns:
      all the blueprints in the system
      Throws:
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if there are no blueprints

    • updateBlueprint

      void updateBlueprint(Blueprint bp) throws BlueprintPersistenceException, BlueprintNotFoundException
      Updates an existing blueprint.
      Parameters:
      bp - the blueprint with updated information
      Throws:
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if a persistence error occurs
      BlueprintNotFoundException - if the blueprint does not exist

    • deleteBlueprint

      void deleteBlueprint(Blueprint bp) throws BlueprintNotFoundException, BlueprintPersistenceException
      Deletes an existing blueprint.
      Parameters:
      bp - the blueprint to delete
      Throws:
      BlueprintNotFoundException - if the blueprint does not exist
      BlueprintPersistenceException - if a persistence error occurs
